name: All stylesheet files should be in a specific directory
description: All stylesheet files (X) should be in a "styles" directory, located in the web root.
output: This report lists all style sheet files (X) located outside the "styles" directory. It provides the following information: File full name, File directory
rationale: For maintainability aspects, file organization must be respected.
remediation: Change file location according to the recommended naming convention.
